definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Introduce the productive state of serine all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 介绍目前丝氨酸的国内外生产状况。

sentences.english: Tripeptide aldehyde. Reversible competitive inhibitor of serine and cysteine proteases.
sentences.chinese: 丝氨酸和半胱氨酸蛋白酶可逆的抑制剂。

sentences.english: L-Proline is a neutral, genetically coded amino acid. It is a common constituent of many proteins.
sentences.chinese: 丝氨酸是一种中性氨基酸，是许多蛋白质的常见成分。

sentences.english: Homoserine has also been implicated in the biosynthesis of methionine.
sentences.chinese: 同型丝氨酸也牵涉到蛋氨酸的生物合成。

sentences.english: Inhibits also most of other mammalian serine proteases but at a lower rate.
sentences.chinese: 也抑制大多数其他哺乳动物丝氨酸蛋白酶但速率低。

sentences.english: Apoptotic cells expose phosphatidylserine and are swiftly engulfed by macrophages.
sentences.chinese: 凋亡细胞暴露出磷脂酰丝氨酸并迅速被巨噬细胞吞噬。

sentences.english: Serine proteases catalyze the cleavge of peptide bonds in proteins.
sentences.chinese: 丝氨酸蛋白酶催化蛋白质中肽键的分解。

sentences.english: This serine biosynthesis has been demonstrated in mitochondrial preparation.
sentences.chinese: 在线粒体制备中，证明有丝氨酸生物合成。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo determine the species and quantities of serine protease inhibitors in Jue-ming-zi(Cassia obtusifolia L).
sentences.chinese: 目的确定决明子中丝氨酸蛋白酶抑制剂的种类和数量。
